name: Smithy With Me
description:
Smithy With Me is a small little blacksmithing game where you must craft items to meet the monthly quota and keep your workshop running. 

Best played with an Xbox controller. 
Controls (Keyboard / Xbox Controller):
WASD / Left Stick - Movement
E / A Button - Pick Up / Place Item
F / X Button - Interact / Work
